name: Iomulo
description: Social Network for teachers and students
overview:
www.iomulo.com is a free website for people looking for and offering private lessons, in any subject, launched in Italy and expanding globally.

Iomulo wants to offer a quality service, doesn’t show unwelcome commercials or popups and doesn’t spam, just offers wide opportunities to look for and offer lessons.

The subscription procedure is extremely easy: you are asked for essential data and a couple of minutes of your time. You can tailor the information you give, describing yourself and your professionalism.

By subscribing you’ll share your knowledge with the whole Iomulo community, teaching or attending the courses you prefer from those published in our database. You’ll be able to place specific other requests and publish your offerings on your dedicated page.
